rules.prepare:
cd "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR" if [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" = "cross-tools" ]; then grep -r 'ldscripts' * | grep -v 'cross-ldscripts' | cut -d':' -f1 | \ sort -u | while read FILENAME; do sed -i 's/ldscripts/cross-ldscripts/g' "$FILENAME" done EXTRA_OPTS="--disable-shared --disable-plugins \ --with-sysroot=/" elif [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" = "tools" ]; then EXTRA_OPTS="--enable-shared --enable-plugins --with-sysroot=/tools --program-prefix=${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-" else EXTRA_OPTS="--enable-shared --enable-plugins --with-sysroot=/ --program-prefix=${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-" fi
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/configure" \ --prefix="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" \ --disable-multiarch \ --disable-multilib \ --disable-nls \ --disable-doc \ --disable-silent-rules \ --with-system-zlib \ --with-pkgversion="GNU Binutils for Bolt Linux" \ --build="$BOLT_BUILD_TYPE" \ --host="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --target="$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE" \ $EXTRA_OPTS
rules.install:
cd $BOLT_BUILD_DIR make DESTDIR=$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR install
rm "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-ld" ln -sf "${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-ld.bfd" \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-ld"
if [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" = "cross-tools" -o "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" = "target" ]; then for PROG in "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-"*; do BASENAME=`basename $PROG` SHORTNAME=`echo $BASENAME | sed "s/${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-//g"`
ln -sf "$BASENAME" \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/$SHORTNAME" done fi
if [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" = "tools" -o "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" = "target" ]; then for i in demangle.h libiberty.h; do install -m 644 "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/include/$i" \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/include" done fi
PKG_BINUTILS="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/binutils" install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_BINUTILS" install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_BINUTILS/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_BINUTILS/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin" install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_BINUTILS/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib"
PKG_BINUTILS_DEV="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/binutils-dev" install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_BINUTILS_DEV" install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_BINUTILS_DEV/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX"
mv -v "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/"* \ "$PKG_BINUTILS/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/"
if [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" = "cross-tools" ]; then mv -v "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/cross-ldscripts" \ "$PKG_BINUTILS/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/" else mv -v "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/ldscripts" \ "$PKG_BINUTILS/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/" fi
if [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" != "cross-tools" ]; then rm -f "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/"*.la
mv -v "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/"libbfd-*.so \ "$PKG_BINUTILS/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/" mv -v "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/"libopcodes-*.so \ "$PKG_BINUTILS/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/"
mv -v "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib" \ "$PKG_BINUTILS_DEV/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/" mv -v "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/include" \ "$PKG_BINUTILS_DEV/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/" fi
